    • Method Detail

      • guessEncoding

        public static java.lang.String guessEncoding(byte[] bytes,
                             java.util.Map<DecodeHintType,?> hints)
        Parameters:
        bytes - bytes encoding a string, whose encoding should be guessed
        hints - decode hints if applicable
        Returns:
        name of guessed encoding; at the moment will only guess one of: SHIFT_JIS, UTF8, ISO88591, or the platform default encoding if none of these can possibly be correct
